item.title: Help plz edit weapon bonus
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

for me thats in itemlist.cfg but yeh umm so how to i chnage bonus on a specific item tho?

[code]public class ItemList {
public int itemId;
public String itemName;
public String itemDescription;
public double ShopValue;
public double LowAlch;
public double HighAlch;
public int[] Bonuses = new int[100];

public ItemList(int _itemId) {
	itemId = _itemId;
}

}
[/code]

thats the hole itemlist thing i got but it is itemlist.txt and i have item1.txt item 2.txt item3.txt and no item.cfg.?

Read full topic
